pros: Great utility with skills that allow you to dodge attacks and reduce %Max HP damage for party
Main bossing skill Assassinate grants Super Knockback Resistance, bosses cannot knock you back
High %Avoidability and tankiness while training from Mesoguard and Shadow Shifter
Single-target Trick Blade is an iframe
cons: Attacks can be slow without high Attack Speed but are hard-hitting
Although mobile, they do not have a consistent form of vertical mobility

baseStats: Excludes attack specfic bonuses, Hyper Skill passives, Link Skills, and buffs with cooldowns
Crit Rate: [ up to +100%] [ up to +50%]
Crit Damage: [ +15%] [ +20% & up to +10%]
Damage: [ up to +25%]
Final Damage: [ +25%] [ +5% while active]

details: Can be stacked up to 3 times, once for each unique Explorer Thief to reach Master Level

info: To create one, choose the 'Explorers' option in the Character Creation screen and then continue through the story until you reach the quest 'Victoria Island or Bust' and choose the 'Thief, speedy and sneaky' option

Once you reach Lv. 30 as a Thief, talk to Dark Lord to accept a quest called 'Path of the Bandit'. Completing the quest will make you a Bandit and you will be on the path to a Shadower. Bandit is the 2nd job of Shadower

build: -> -> -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> -> -> -> -> ->
details: Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path
4th Job skills require Mastery Books to reach Master Level

hyperBuild.recommended:
• Meso Explosion - Enhance
  • Boomerang Stab - Reinforce and Extra Strike
  • Assassinate - Reinforce and Boss Rush

content.specialThanks: Special thanks to Poro for their help in making this overview!

extraContent.title: Dark Sight
extraContent.content:
Referenced from Nox and Fatalyz

Dark Sight can only ignore falling debris such as from bosses like Magnus meteors, Pierre hats, Vellum rocks, Papulatus falling clocks, and Lotus demolishers. There are several %Max HP attacks that can be ignored, for example, Magnus spin attack, Crimson Queen's DoT flame, and Damien falling yellow/red meteors

Other attacks that can be avoided include, Gollux reverse key bomb (debuff still applies but no damage or stun is taken) and Magnus stun smoke Most non-debris one-shots cannot be avoided. For example, Vellum's tail attack and head pop, Von Bon's orb projectile and Crimson Queen's flame breath

All direct endgame boss attacks such as Lotus, Damien, Lucid and Will are unavoidable

primary.name: Three Snails
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 7, Damage 40
primary.desc: Throws a snail shell forward that deals fixed amount of damage

primary.name: Recovery
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 15, Recover 72 HP over 30 sec

primary.name: Nimble Feet
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, Duration 12, Movement Speed: 20

primary.name: Maple Return
primary.shortDesc: Returns you to Southperry Harbor on Maple Island.\nCooldown: 600 sec

primary.name: Double Stab
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 14, Damage: 165%
primary.desc: Stabs a single enemy twice

primary.name: Lucky Seven
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 14, Damage: 190%
primary.desc: Throws 2 throwing stars at a single enemy

primary.name: Haste
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Duration: 200 sec, Speed: +40, Jump: +20\n[Passive Effects - Max Speed: +20]

primary.name: Dark Sight
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 5, hides in the shadows for 200 seconds.\nWhen Dark Sight is deactivated, cooldown increased per attack dodged: 3 seconds. Stacks up to 5 times.
primary.desc: While active, you cannot hit or be hit by enemies
details: Has a cooldown (3 secs, stacks up to 5 times) per attack dodged
You can use Flash Jump while in Dark Sight

primary.name: Flash Jump
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 12, jumps further, able to use 2 times consecutively.
primary.desc: Double jump skill
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing jump twice
Can be used twice in a row

primary.name: Nimble Body
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increases LUK by 20

primary.name: Savage Blow
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, attack 8 enemies with 192% damage 3 times.
primary.desc: Slashes forward several times

primary.name: Critical Growth
primary.shortDesc: Per interval/attack - Critical Rate: +3%, Critical Damage: +1% (capped at +10%)
primary.desc: While you attack, you slowly gain %Crit Rate until you reach 100% and %Crit Damage (up to 10%) and the passive will reset

primary.name: Steal
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 24, Steal Chance: 49%, Max Enemies Hit: 4, Damage: 330%, Stun Duration: 5 sec. When consuming a potion that was stolen from a boss, it recovers HP/MP and activates Attack Power +30 buff for 3 minutes
primary.desc: Performs a quick attack that has a chance to drop an item and a potion which you consume immediately
details:
You can attempt repeatedly until you succeed
  • You can steal from an enemy only once

The potion stolen can recover HP or MP
  • If the potion was stolen from a boss, you recover both HP and MP plus you gain an Attack buff

primary.name: Dagger Booster
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, Dagger Attack Speed increased for 200 sec
primary.desc: Increases Attack Speed (by 2 stages)

primary.name: Mesoguard
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 27, Duration: 200 sec, Damage Received: -50%, Mesos Consumed for Reduced Damage: 50%.
primary.desc: Increases %Damage Reduction
details: Consumes some Mesos based on how much damage was taken (very small amount)

primary.name: Channel Karma
primary.shortDesc: Attack +30

primary.name: Dagger Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Dagger Mastery: +50%

primary.name: Physical Training
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increases LUK by 30 and DEX by 30

primary.name: Shield Mastery
primary.shortDesc: When shield or dagger scabbard is equipped, DEF: +110%, Avoidability: +20%, Attack Power: +15

primary.name: Midnight Carnival
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 26, Number of Attacks: 7, Damage: 160%
primary.desc: Deals devastating damage to one enemy

primary.name: Phase Dash
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 45, Damage: 420%, Number of Attacks: 2, Max Enemies Hit: 8
primary.desc: Dashes forward while pushing back enemies

primary.name: Meso Explosion
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Damage: 100% and Number of Attacks: 2 per Meso per enemy, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Max Number of Projectiles: 15
primary.desc: Causes Mesos dropped by Pick Pocket to seek out and damage nearby enemies

primary.name: Dark Flare
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Duration: 60 sec, Inflicts 360% damage over its duration, Reflects 1300% damage dealt by nearby enemies, Cooldown: 60 sec
primary.desc: Creates a damaging field that also reflects back enemy damage taken within the field
details: Cannot reflect more than half of the enemy's Max HP
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Pick Pocket
primary.shortDesc: Meso Drop Chance: 30%, Max Mesos Created: 15.\nWhen mesos are consumed from being hit with Mesoguard up, up to 5 mesos drop.\nMesos do not drop from Venom or Sudden Raid, which to damage over time.
primary.desc: When toggled, your attacks have a chance to drop Mesos which are used by
details: Mesos do not drop from summoning skills, 5th Job Common Skills, , Venom, or Sudden Raid (4th Job)

primary.name: Shadow Partner
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 64, summons a shadow that makes an additional hit that is 70% of the final damage for all attacks for 200 sec
primary.desc: Creates a clone that mimics your attacks, increasing the number of hits you deal per attack
details: The clone's attack deals reduced %Final Damage
Does not mimic , summoning skills, and 5th Job Common Skills

primary.name: Advanced Dark Sight
primary.shortDesc: 15% chance to maintain Dark Sight on attacking. When inside your own Smokescreen or Shadow Veil, this increases to 100%.\n15% chance to auto-trigger Dark Sight, Final Damage +5% when attacking during Dark Sight.\nIf you dodge an attack that deals damage proportional to Max HP, using the Dark Sight that activates when you are hit, the Dark Sight's remaining time will be reduced by 20% of its maximum.
primary.desc: While in , you can attack and use skills with a chance to not deactivate the buff. Additionally, when you are hit, there is a chance that will automatically activate
details: While in the automatic , if you dodge an attack that deals %Max HP, the duration is reduced slightly
Additionally, you gain increased %Final Damage while in

primary.name: Into Darkness
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Teleport to enemy within range and go into Dark Sight. Cooldown shared with Dark Sight.
primary.desc: Teleport to an enemy within range and activates
details: Shares cooldown with

primary.name: Venom
primary.shortDesc: Status Chance: 30%, Damage Over Time: 90% damage every 1 sec for 6 sec
primary.desc: Grants a chance for your attacks to apply a poisoning debuff

primary.name: Meso Mastery
primary.shortDesc:
Monster Meso Drop Rate: +20%, Mesoguard Damage Guard Rate: +10%
Mesos Consumed by Mesoguard: -20%
Meso Explosion Damage (per shot): +20% points
[Passive Effect - Attack Power: +5]
primary.desc: Increases the amount of Mesos that drop and the chance that Mesos drop from and the %p Damage of
details: [Passive]: Grants flat Attack
Additionally, increases the %Damage Reduction and reduces the amount of Mesos consumed by

primary.name: Enveloping Darkness
primary.shortDesc: Max HP: +20%, Abnormal Status Resistance: +30, Elemental Resistance: +30%

primary.name: Assassinate
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 44, Damage: 275%, Number of Consecutive Attacks: 6, Press the skill key once more to deal 350% damage 6 times as the final blow.\nWhen Dark Sight is used, damage increases by 150%. Final Damage increases by 100% when Body Count is 3.
primary.desc: Strikes an enemy several times before unleashing a devastating attack
details:
Assassinate has two attacks, the initial strike and pressing the Skill Key again will activate the final strike
  • The final strike is a guaranteed critical hit
Attack deals increased %Damage while in
Attack deals increased %Final Damage when Shadower Instinct stacks is at 3 however, the stacks will be consumed

primary.name: Boomerang Stab
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 40, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 375%, Number of Attacks: 4, Stun Chance: 90%, Stun Duration: 4 sec.\n[Passive Effect: Final damage increases by 25%]
primary.desc: Slashes forward twice in a row with a chance to stun enemies hit
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %Final Damage
Has a reduced chance to drop Mesos from

primary.name: Prime Critical
primary.shortDesc: For every interval or attack - Critical Rate: +6%, Critical Damage: +2%, Critical Damage Increase Cap: 10%.\n[Passive Effect - LUK +10, Critical Damage +20%]
details: Increases %Crit Rate and %Crit Damage growth per interval
Now grants flat LUK and increases %Crit Damage
Unaffected by Combat Orders

primary.name: Sudden Raid
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 290, Damage: 494%, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Number of Attacks: 7, Damage Over Time: 210% damage every 1 sec for 10 sec, Cooldown: 30 sec
primary.desc: Unleashes a devastating large attack that applies a damaging burning debuff
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Maple Warrior
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 60, Increases all stats assigned APs by 15% for 900 sec

primary.name: Smokescreen
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 46, Critical Damage within the Smokescreen: +20%, Damage Taken in Proportion to Max HP: -10%, \nDuration: 30 sec, Cooldown: 150 sec
primary.desc: Creates a smokescreen where party members cannot be hit by enemy attacks
details: will not deactivate while attacking when in the smokescreen

For attacks that deal %Max HP damage, the damage will be reduced
  • Smokescreen can also block certain key boss attacks such as Lotus' lightning floor & purple orbs and Will's screen crack
Enemies within the smokescreen take increased %Crit Damage

primary.name: Hero's Will
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Cooldown: 360 sec
primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for a few seconds

primary.name: Shadower Instinct
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 22, Duration: 200 sec, Attack Power: +40, additional 10 each point of Body Count (uses entire Body Count).\n[Passive Effects: Enemy DEF Ignored: 20%, Accumulate Body Count points upon attack]
primary.desc: Grants flat Attack
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %Ignore DEF

While attacking, you gain stacks of 'Body Count' (up to 3) which when consumed by Shadower Instinct will provide more Attack
  • also consumes Body Counts at max stacks

primary.name: Shadow Shifter
primary.shortDesc: Additional Avoidability Chance: 45%
primary.desc: Grants a chance to dodge attacks

primary.name: Toxic Venom
primary.shortDesc: Poison Chance: 50%, 160% damage every 1 sec for 8 sec, can be stacked 3 times
details: Increases debuff chance, duration, and %Damage
Can now be stacked (up to 3 times)

primary.name: Dagger Expert
primary.shortDesc: Dagger Mastery: +70%, Attack Power: +40, Critical Damage: +15%
details: Increases %Weapon Mastery provided
Now grants flat Attack and increases %Crit Damage

hyperPassive.name: Meso Explosion - Enhance
hyperPassive.shortDesc: Max number of usable Mesos dropped from Pick Pocket: 5. Chance for Mesos to drop from Pick Pocket: +10%.

hyperActive.name: Flip of the Coin
hyperActive.shortDesc: Can only use when you land a critical attack. MP Cost: 50, Duration: 120 sec, Damage: +5%, Critical Rate: +10%, Max Stacks: 5
hyperActive.desc: Whenever you land a Critical Hit, you can use this skill to gain a stacking buff of %Damage and %Crit Rate (up to 5 times)
details: Has no cooldown

hyperActive.name: Shadow Veil
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 300, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 800%, Duration: 12 sec.\nCooldown: 60 sec
hyperActive.desc: Creates a large damaging field of slashing blades
details: will not deactivate while attacking when in the veil

hyperActive.name: Epic Adventure
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Duration: 60 sec, Damage: +10%\nCooldown: 120 sec. Applies to any Explorer class in the party

fifthMain.name: Shadow Assault
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 300, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Rush Damage: 1220%, Number of Attacks: 6, Critical Rate: +25%, Enemy DEF Ignored: +100%\nAttacks up to 4 times in the direction of your choice\nCan be used 2-4 times, with a 60 sec cooldown that starts after the first hit
fifthMain.desc: Dashes towards a chosen direction while damaging enemies in your path
details: Attack has increased %Crit Rate and 100% Ignore DEF
Pressing the desired Arrow Keys along with the Skill Key will dash towards that direction, including diagonal directions

Can be used up to 4 times and the cooldown starts after the initial cast
  • If the skill is off cooldown and is casted again before all the charges are used, you regain maximum charges and the cooldown is applied again

fifthMain.name: Trickblade
fifthMain.shortDesc:
Passive Effect: The last enemy hit with Assassinate receives a wound debuff for 10 sec that can stack up to 3 times. Only 1 enemy can receive the wound debuff. If the debuff is given to a new enemy, the previous debuff disappears.
Active Effect - MP Cost: 650, summons your friends that were hiding to deal 1100% damage up to 10 enemies 5 times.
If one of the enemies has the wound debuff at max stack, you can use it by linking from Assassinate's last attack to move behind that enemy and activate Chase Cut 4 times dealing 950% damage 7 times with Critical Rate +100% and ignoring 100% additional enemy Defense. Invincibile for 1 sec after the attack.
Cooldown: 14 sec
details:
[Passive]: Enemies hit by the final attack of receive a stacking debuff (up to 3 times) that is consumed by Trick Blade
  • Only 1 enemy can receive the debuff at a time

If an enemy has the debuff at max stack, you can link together with Trick Blade to dash behind that enemy and deal a devastating attack
  • The attack instead deals heavy damage to that one target and gains 100% Crit Rate and 100% Ignore DEF
  • Unaffected by Attack Ignore and Damage Reflect
  • You are also briefly invincible after the attack

fifthMain.name: Sonic Blow
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 1000, periodically deals 1000% damage to 8 enemies 7 time(s) for 2.5 sec, Additional Monster DEF Ignored: +100%\nCooldown: 80 sec\nCooldown decreases by 0.5 sec for each Body Count point
fifthMain.desc: Unleashes a barrage of slashes in front of you
details: Attack has 100% Ignore DEF
You cannot be knocked back while casting
For each Body Count consumed, the cooldown is decreased slightly

fifthMain.name: Slash Shadow Formation
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 1200, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 850%, Number of Attacks: 8. Allies appear 12 times then the leader appears. Additional DEF Ignored: 20%\nLeader: Chase Cut Activation: 4, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 1250%, Number of Attacks: 15\nCooldown: 90 sec
fifthMain.desc: Over a few seconds, shadows appear and slashes through enemies around you before dealing a devastating final blow
details: Attack has increased %Ignore DEF
When used with or , there is not casting animation and can be used at the same time
Unaffected by Damage Reflect and

meta: Shadower is a LUK thief class part of the Explorers class group. Shadower is a strong and hard-hitting class with insane 5th job skills. Before 5th job, Shadowers have some strong utility with Dark Sight that allows you to ignore almost all enemy attacks and Smokescreen that reduces the damage taken from %Max HP for your whole party
